h2_title: The Mad Tiger in the Well
content: It's not just the Tiger Vanguard you can take down in Chapter 2, you can also find a Mad Tiger. First, find the Tiger's Acolyte in Windgate Village. He'll drop an Old Rattle-Drum which you can use in three spots across the chapter to uncover its secret. Once you've found all three and used the drum, a well will be revealed near Sandgate Village. Drop down into it and go head-to-head with the Mad Tiger.
